title.rendered: Bruce Springsteen on the Death of Charles Cross

content.rendered:
Here on E Street, we’re saddened over the passing of Charles Cross. As the founder of Backstreets, Charles created a wonderful magazine and positive community that gave our fans the chance to connect through their stories, ideas and shared experiences. We’re grateful to him for bringing conversations and insights around our music to so many. He was an exceptional journalist, publisher, thinker and facilitator, and he will be missed.

Bruce Springsteen

We’re grateful to him for bringing conversations and insights around our music to so many. […]
